text: The Pixel 9a is an Android smartphone developed and made by Google. It was announced on March 19, 2025. It was released on April 10, 2025 in other countries due to component quality problems. It was released on April 16, 2025 in India. It has a AI features. == Features == Pixel 9a has a 6.3 P-OLED HDR 120hz screen, 5100mAh battery capacity, 8GB RAM, 48MP wide back camera, 13MP ultrawide back camera, 13MP ultrawide HDR selfie camera, Google Tensor G4 chipset, 128/256GB storage and no SD card slot. == Software == It currently run Android 15. It get free Gemini Live Astra camera feature. == Colors == The Pixel 9a comes with four colors such as blue, pink, white and black. == Reviews == Wired reviews the Pixel 9a, it has a good reviews such as very good performance, wireless charger, very good two cameras and improved water resistance, it has a bad reviews such as some problems with Assistant Voice Typing and few Gemini features are missing, the rating of 9/10. == References == == Other websites == * Category:Mobile phones introduced in 2025 Category:Mobile phones with multiple rear cameras Category:Google mobile phones Category:Mobile phones with 4K video recording
title: Pixel 9a
